means: 赫尔姆霍茨（姓氏； Hermann Ludwig Ferdinand von, 1821-1894，德国生理学家，物理学家及解剖学家）

sentence.Network_en: The strain energy density function equals the Helmholtz.
sentence.Network_cn: 应变能密度函数等于亥姆霍兹函数.

sentence.Network_en: The electron displacement meets non - linear relation when the radius of Helmholtz coil is given.
sentence.Network_cn: 当亥姆霍兹线圈的半径给定时,电子偏移距离与电流满足非线性关系.

sentence.Network_en: Based on theoretical analysis, inviscid Helmholtz vorticity equation is used to in paint image.
sentence.Network_cn: 理论分析证明, 流体力学中无粘亥姆霍兹涡量方程可以实现图像修复.
